org.xbmc.android.remote.business

Class MusicManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbmc.android.remote.business.AbstractManager
      • org.xbmc.android.remote.business.MusicManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IManager, IMusicManager, INotifiableManager, ISortableManager

    public class MusicManager
extends AbstractManager
implements IMusicManager, ISortableManager, INotifiableManager
    Asynchronously wraps the InfoClient class.
    Author:
    Team XBMC

      • addToPlaylist

        public void addToPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                 Album album,
                 Context context)
        Adds an album to the current playlist. If current playlist is stopped, the album is added to playlist and the first song is selected to play. If something is playing already, the album is only queued.
        Specified by:
        addToPlaylist in interface IMusicManager
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        album - Album to add

      • addToPlaylist

        public void addToPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                 Genre genre,
                 Context context)
        Adds all songs of a genre to the current playlist. If current playlist is stopped, play is executed. Value is the first song of the added album.
        Specified by:
        addToPlaylist in interface IMusicManager
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        genre - Genre of songs to add

      • addToPlaylist

        public void addToPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                 Song song,
                 Context context)
        Adds a song to the current playlist. Even if the playlist is empty, only this song will be added.
        Specified by:
        addToPlaylist in interface IMusicManager
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        album - Song to add

      • addToPlaylist

        public void addToPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                 Album album,
                 Song song,
                 Context context)
        Adds a song to the current playlist. If the playlist is empty, the whole album will be added with this song playing, otherwise only this song is added. Attention, the response.value result is different as usual: True means the whole album was added, false means ony the song.
        Specified by:
        addToPlaylist in interface IMusicManager
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        album - Album to add
        song - Song to play

      • addToPlaylist

        public void addToPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                 Artist artist,
                 Context context)
        Adds all songs from an artist to the playlist. If current playlist is stopped, the all songs of the artist are added to playlist and the first song is selected to play. If something is playing already, the songs are only queued.
        Specified by:
        addToPlaylist in interface IMusicManager
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        artist - Artist

      • addToPlaylist

        public void addToPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                 Artist artist,
                 Genre genre,
                 Context context)
        Adds all songs of a genre from an artist to the playlist. If nothing is playing, the first song will be played, otherwise songs are just added to the playlist.
        Specified by:
        addToPlaylist in interface IMusicManager
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        artist - Artist
        genre - Genre

                   int position,
                   Context context)

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • removeFromPlaylist

        public void removeFromPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                      int position,
                      Context context)
        Removes media from the current playlist. It is not possible to remove the media if it is currently being played.
        Specified by:
        removeFromPlaylist in interface IMusicManager
        Parameters:
        position - Position to remove, starting with 0.
        response - Response object

      • removeFromPlaylist

                      java.lang.String path,
                      Context context)
        Removes media from the current playlist. It is not possible to remove the media if it is currently being played.
        Specified by:
        removeFromPlaylist in interface IMusicManager
        Parameters:
        position - Complete path (including filename) of the media to be removed.

      • checkForPlayAfterQueue

        private void checkForPlayAfterQueue(IMusicClient mc,
                          IControlClient cc,
                          int numAlreadyQueued)
        Checks if something's playing. If that's not the case, set the playlist's play position either to the start if there were no items before, or to the first position of the newly added files.
        Parameters:
        mc - Music client
        cc - Control client
        numAlreadyQueued - Number of previously queued items
